title: The New Yorker follows up with earthquake, tsunami instructions, saying Portland faces enhanced threats
text: BING NEWS: The New Yorker follows up with earthquake, tsunami instructions, saying Portland faces enhanced threats Kathryn Schulz, the author of an article in The New Yorker about the massive earthquake and tsunami expected to hit the Northwest, has written another story that says Portland faces especially high risks.
